leth July, 1699.——A Lithuanian Catholic boy, seduced by the Muscovites‚ fied from our kitchen to a certain Russian prince‚ to embrace the Russian re- ligion, in the hope of getting a wife, as they had promised him upon that condition. Knes Repnin,⁷ Colonel of the Dragoons‚ and his servants, stung by some gad-fly to fremy, broke violently in upon the city guard, and as he was on the point of snatching away the colors, the ensign received him upon his pike in the most creditable manner. Several others were wounded in the strife on both sides.
